segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 40
segments.en: Linked Discourses 40

segments.pli: 1. Moggallānavagga
segments.en: 1. By Moggallāna

segments.pli: 1. Paṭhamajhānapañhāsutta
segments.en: 1. A Question About the First Absorption

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Mahāmoggallāna was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Tatra kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
segments.en: There Venerable Mahāmoggallāna addressed the mendicants:

segments.pli: “āvuso bhikkhave”ti.
segments.en: “Reverends, mendicants!”

segments.pli: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosuṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend,” they replied.

segments.pli: Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
segments.en: Venerable Mahāmoggallāna said this:

segments.pli: “Idha mayhaṃ, āvuso, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
segments.en: “Just now, reverends, as I was in private retreat this thought came to mind:

segments.pli: ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamaṃ jhānan’ti vuccati.
segments.en: ‘They speak of this thing called the “first absorption”.

segments.pli: Katamaṃ nu kho paṭhamaṃ jhānanti?
segments.en: What is the first absorption?’

segments.pli: Tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, etadahosi:
segments.en: It occurred to me:

segments.pli: ‘idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
segments.en: ‘It’s when a mendicant, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.

segments.pli: Idaṃ vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānan’ti.
segments.en: This is called the first absorption.’

segments.pli: So khvāhaṃ, āvuso, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
segments.en: And so … I was entering and remaining in the first absorption.

segments.pli: Tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
segments.en: While I was in that meditation, perceptions and attentions accompanied by sensual pleasures beset me.

segments.pli: Atha kho maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
segments.en: Then the Buddha came up to me with his psychic power and said,

segments.pli: ‘moggallāna, moggallāna.
segments.en: ‘Moggallāna, Moggallāna!

segments.pli: Mā, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pamādo, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ saṇṭhapehi, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ ekodiṃ karohi, paṭhame jhāne cittaṃ samādahā’ti.
segments.en: Don’t neglect the first absorption, brahmin! Settle your mind in the first absorption; unify your mind and immerse it in the first absorption.’

segments.pli: So khvāhaṃ, āvuso, aparena samayena vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.
segments.en: And so, after some time … I entered and remained in the first absorption.

segments.pli: Yañhi taṃ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
segments.en: So if anyone should be rightly called

segments.pli: ‘satthārānuggahito sāvako mahābhiññataṃ patto’ti, mamaṃ taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
segments.en: a disciple who attained to great direct knowledge with help from the Teacher, it’s me.”

segments.pli: ‘satthārānuggahito sāvako mahābhiññataṃ patto’”ti.
Paṭhamaṃ.

sections.title: At one time Venerable Mahāmoggallāna was staying near Sāvatthī…

suttaplex.blurb: Moggallāna speaks to the mendicants of a time when his practice of the first absorption was faltering. He expresses his gratitude for the Buddha, who urged him to stabilize that attainment.
